name: MFC Ribbon Definition XML File
summary: Learn about .MFCRIBBON-MS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MFCRIBBON-MS files are only available for MFC (Microsoft Foundation Class) applications. MFC is a set of libraries that provide user interface elements for creating Windows programs.

description: Developer file created by the Ribbon Designer component of Microsoft Visual Studio development software; saves the design for a ribbon, which is a user interface component that merges the toolbar and menu bar into a single element; used as one of several project files when developing a Windows program.
